title: Which is the best laptop up to 50,000 INR in January-February 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: You can check out MSI Mordern 14. I know its around 55k ,but check out for festive sales(online market) where laptop prices decrease drastically. And you'd be lucky enough to get it for around 50k. Or ASUS Vibobook gaming i5 8th gen with GTX 1650 graphics, priced around 50k.
in my opinion, Acer nitro would be a good one and I use a predator helio 300 so I know Acer gaming laptops are good. so you can go with Acer nitro.
